#summary Sample Application: Gaussian Mixture Models
#labels Type-SampleApps

 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-machinelearning-gmm-bin.zip application]
 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-machinelearning-gmm-src.zip source code]

This sample application shows how to use [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_MachineLearning_GaussianMixtureModel.htm Gaussian Mixture Models] to perform [http://crsouza.blogspot.com.br/2010/10/gaussian-mixture-models-and-expectation.html clustering and classification using soft-decision margins].
